TopicTitle: ODST Remake - Can you make a ODST drop Satellite?

Articles.Content:
This is for a really fun little challenge no real winners just fun.

So the challenge is really simple can you make a ODST drop pod satellite?

With self destruct system such as a non throttled de-orbiter if thats possible, or just get creatively crafty.

Rules:

No Hyper-Edit

No Cheats/Debug (Any Cheats/Debugs)

And have fun doing it there's no wrong entries if you tried

No really specific things but, the drop pods must be landed on any surface safely (not ANY surface just make sure our kerbal division of odst soldiers land safely)

Try to keep the time till landing a bit short if you can, ODST need to be in and out

Here's a bit of reference, i haven't made my own attempt due to i cannot find the necessary mods and/or inspiration, i'm not good sometimes with ksp-game builds/challenges/anything.

Thanks for Reading!

...And Good Luck

If anyone needs more details, then reply you know the drill lol.

Edited September 1, 2014 by KooperIO

Could we see your attempt, and maybe some reference pictures?

Just a little bit of tweaking and this will be do-able, IMO
